channel.title: Long help
channel.description:
Hey guys ive been playing rsps's for around 3 years now I've never been on the coding side and would appreciate someone walking me through from the beginning I know I can just get a tutorial from youtube, but I want to understand why I do every step in return I can advertise for your server which I am very good at, and even offer you a part on my team
Not sure if this is the correction section to post this, but I need major help its a 317 so I think it should be fairly easy , thanks in advance

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

I’ll teamview you and help you tomorrow, Remind me by pm

Read full topic

still nothing , dang I’m already having problems and the servers not even up

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Hungerfist, post:10, topic:509215”]I found something thats server =
it was set on a diffrent ip set it to 127.0.0.1 and this time it said error connecting to server
dont think I’m missing anything[/quote]
Make sure you compile any changes.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Hungerfist, post:8, topic:509215”]im using the teamtorva client and source
I think its PI almost positive

what am I supposed to search and change to 127.0.0.1? I have a few things set to that but I dont think theyre the right ones[/quote]

In the client files [Not source/server] Open client.java. Search “serverip” no quotes.

Read full topic

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Make sure it’s set to 127.0.0.1 in all the server ports, there are probably 2 or 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @Hungerfist Hungerfist
item.description:
@Hungerfist wrote:

Thanks for that link , ill have to check that out more detailed soon

Rihgt now Ive learned how to set my enviro path
and learned how to set the compile under my jdk , but when I try logging into the actual server it says ‘no response from server’
I think the localhost is set to 127.0.0.1 , and I can’t think of what else might be keeping me from logging in

Read full topic

item.title: Long help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

[quote=“Hungerfist, post:1, topic:509215”]Hey guys ive been playing rsps’s for around 3 years now
I’ve never been on the coding side and would appreciate someone walking me through from the beginning
I know I can just get a tutorial from youtube, but I want to understand why I do every step
in return I can advertise for your server which I am very good at, and even offer you a part on my team

Not sure if this is the correction section to post this, but I need major help
its a 317 so I think it should be fairly easy , thanks in advance[/quote]

Try yourself. If you’re stuck on a part, we’d love to help. (I say ‘we’ loosely.)

Read full topic
